author: max
name: EasterHunt
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. Use `[p]easterhunt hunt` to start hunting for eggs!
The rarity for eggs are explained here: <https://github.com/ltzmax/maxcogs/blob/master/easterhunt/README.md>.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Easter games where users can hunt for eggs, work for egg shards, give eggs to others or steal, and earn achievements and more.
short: Easter games where users can hunt for eggs, work for egg shards, give eggs to others or steal, and earn achievements and more.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
